paragraphs.title: Introduction
paragraphs.text:
%md

# Introduction

This tutorial is to demonstrate how to do job control in flink (job submission/cancel/resume).
2 steps:
1. Create custom data stream and register it as flink table. The custom data stream is a simulated web access logs. 
2. Query this flink table (pv for each page type), you can cancel it and then resume it again w/o savepoint.

msg.data:
Introduction

This tutorial is to demonstrate how to do job control in flink (job submission/cancel/resume).
2 steps:

  1. Create custom data stream and register it as flink table. The custom data stream is a simulated web access logs.
  2. Query this flink table (pv for each page type), you can cancel it and then resume it again w/o savepoint.

paragraphs.title: Register Data Source
Resume flink sql job without savepoint
paragraphs.text:
%flink.ssql(type=update)

select url, count(1) as c from log group by url

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Resume flink sql job from savepoint
paragraphs.text:
%flink.ssql(type=update,parallelism=2,maxParallelism=10,savepointDir=/tmp/flink_a)

select url, count(1) as pv from log group by url

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Resume flink scala job from savepoint
paragraphs.text:
%flink(parallelism=1,maxParallelism=10,savepointDir=/tmp/flink_b)

val table = stenv.sqlQuery("select url, count(1) as pv from log group by url")

z.show(table, streamType="update")

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Resume flink python job from savepoint
paragraphs.text:
%flink.ipyflink(parallelism=1,maxParallelism=10,savepointDir=/tmp/flink_c)

table = st_env.sql_query("select url, count(1) as pv from log group by url")

z.show(table, stream_type="update")

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]
